PAGE.TITLE: Maven
PAGE.CONTENT:
Command line options
-B
--batch-mode Run in non-interactive (batch) mode
-s <file>
-s,--settings <file> Alternate path for the user settings file
Skip tests in install or package phase: mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true mvn clean package -Dmaven.test.skip=true
Compile the test sources and copies their resources, but skip their execution: mvn clean install -DskipTests mvn clean package -DskipTests
Use ${env.VARIABLE_NAME} to get the value of an environment variable.
Display where is the Maven local repository: mvn help:evaluate -Dexpression=settings.localRepository The repository can be defined in the settings.xml file with the <localRepository>/path/to/local/repo</localRepository> element.
